title: Lost at Sea
description: Ashley decided to take her fears head on. She is tired of being held back in life from any risk. Taking a girls vacation to Trinidad is going to be the start of her new life of concurring her fears. Reid Walker is handsome, charming, and full of himself. He is a British Actor about to blow up in Hollywood and already has an ego the size of Texas. Fresh off the press tour from his latest movie, he decides to take a relaxing trip to clear his head. After seeing Ashley on the balcony when he checks in the hotel, his attraction to her is immediate. It becomes clear with his long glances and suave behavior he is interested in her. Well clear to everyone but Ashley. She thinks the only way a man like this would ever be interested in Ashley is if they were stranded on an island together. Ashley's worst nightmare or dream fantasy is about to come true.
author: Leslie Sansom
